name: WildSnake
description: WildSnake, known as Super Snakey (スーパー・スネーキー) in Japan, is a puzzle video game inspired by Tetris. Snakes of varying colors and lengths fall from the top of the screen and slither to the bottom. The goal is to clear out the snakes by touching two of the same color. WildSnake was designed by Alexey Lysogorov and presented by Alexey Pajitnov.
